title: Creamy Fruit Medley
directions: Set aside 1 cup whipped topping. Place the remaining topping in a large bowl; sprinkle with gelatin and stir until combined. Fold in the pineapple, oranges, marshmallows and pecans if desired. Garnish with reserved topping.
1 cup: 403 calories, 13g fat (13g saturated fat), 0 cholesterol, 44mg sodium, 66g carbohydrate (50g sugars, 1g fiber), 2g protein.
ingredients: 1 carton (16 ounces) frozen whipped topping, thawed
